bibl.title: A Receipt for Wine from the Aspidas Archive.
Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P.Gascou)

bibl.note: The papyrus forms part of the archive of the family of Aspidas son of Kollouthos, who dwelt in the village of Hipponon in the Herakleopolite nome in the first half of the fourth century. Provenance unknown, 332/333. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Malcolm Choat, A Receipt for Wine from the Aspidas Archive.
Jean-Luc Fournet & Arietta Papaconstantinou (edd.), Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P. Gascou) = TravMém 20 (2016) 1, pp. 101-107, 1 fig.; - 656.

The papyrus forms part of the archive of the family of Aspidas son of Kollouthos, who dwelt in the village of Hipponon in the Herakleopolite nome in the first half of the fourth century. Provenance unknown, 332/333. - Avec résumé en anglais.
